scripts.pack: bun run pack:wasm && rm pkg/.gitignore && tsc
scripts.lint: biome check --write && cargo clippy --fix --allow-dirty --allow-staged && (cd moq-web; cargo clippy --fix --allow-dirty --allow-staged) && (cd moq-gst; cargo clippy --fix --allow-dirty --allow-staged)
scripts.fmt: biome format --write && cargo fmt && (cd moq-web; cargo fmt) && (cd moq-gst; cargo fmt)
